description: The perfect drink to use a bottle of blended&nbsp;Scotch? Here’s one way it can be mixed in! This cocktail tastes crisp and tart at first, but the finish is smoky with peat-smoke flavors, unlike any other sour you've ever had.
name: Scotch Sour
recipeIngredient: Lemon wedge and cocktail cherry for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Add the Buchanan’s, lemon juice, and syrup to a cocktail shaker. Fill with a handful of ice and shake until very cold.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the Buchanan’s, lemon juice, and syrup to a cocktail shaker. Fill with a handful of ice and shake until very cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the drink into a lowball or Old Fashioned glass. Serve with ice, a lemon wedge, and a cocktail cherry.
